description:
Getting the following traceback while running Nova tests on Mac OS X:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/853/
title: Lockfile sync failing on Mac OS X

comments.content:
Getting the following traceback while running Nova tests on Mac OS X:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/853/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

comments.content: Is it the only thing that fails on Mac OS X ? i.e. are we actually that close of supporting Mac OS X as a deployment platform ? Should we ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: We've been using OS X as a development environment when possible. Personally, I haven't seen this issue crop up in a while (all tests passing).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jk0

comments.content: This was fixed a long time ago, just didn't get marked.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
